overview: More goals, more trophies, more followers; for Cristiano Ronaldo life is about being number one, about standing alone.  New documentary explores how Ronaldo has overcome adversity to reach unparalleled heights and examines his journey to become the most followed person on the planet. Has he redefined what it means to be an icon in the 21st Century? And at 36, will he rest on this legacy?
title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Impossible to Ignore
